titleStmt.title: The discription of a true visible Christian right confortable & profitable for all such as are distressed in sowle about present controversies in the churche. Dravven by He. Cl. but published by occasion (as will appeare in the epistle) by Io. I.
titleStmt.author: Clapham, Henoch.
Joope, John.

publicationStmt.date: In the Yeare from Christ his incarnation, 1599.

notesStmt.note: Io I. = John Joope; epistle to the reader signed "Io. Ioope".
Joope's epistle, written from Amsterdam, 1599, indicates that this is the third chapter of a manuscript containing "about 26. ch.". See also STC 5336. Apparently by the same printer as STC 5331--STC.
Place of publication conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
